title: Check out some Summoner’s Rift concept art!

replies.body: To me the first one looks a bit like Hearthstones logo. Idk why.
My friend says League now looks like Dota 2.... I acually disagree but Hearthstone I can agree with :P
I agree 100%
I totally agree my friend.

Yeah, 6/22 I prefer the first one too. The platform looks like an actual summoner's platform with glowing runes while number 2 looks like any old pedestal. Also, the first one seems to have a much nicer hue and detail. I can remember seeing it the first time in the preview and I was completely blown away by there being something off the edge of SR, and now it's just kinda meh.

11/22 IS THAT STITCH IN THE BOTTOM LEFT PANEL?

21/22 I'm using that as my computer background, it's way too good not to use.
the dragon concepts are awesome, it's a shame to see them wasted. why not make different dragons spawn in a random order? mix for their abilities maybe or at least their animations?
Like levels 6-11-16 is when he should transform into a bigger beast with different abilities, that would be coool
I would like if there are monsters roaming in the jungle, wouldn't you agree.
I like this concept you came up with, seems good with the buffs you get with the dragon, good idea

i agree the dragon they r only change how it looks and a little on the attacks the basic attacks now do aoe behind the target it hits and when u start a fight with it flaps its wings blowing u away and stuning just like janna's ult (with out the heal)

Wait so this means that they were in development of the new SR way before developing "A Twist of Fate" cinematic?  That means this new SR was at least 3 years in development.  I always thought that Baron in the cinematic was awesome, and wondered why they changed him so much for the cinematic when most of the other in-game assets were generally more of a literal reference.  So the cinematic team used the new SR Baron model for their piece?  This means we got a super secret preview of the new SR 2 years ago??
Holy shit give us the mushroom thugs
hell yes. they are my fave too
It is SATANS (teemo) Mushrooms

1. the map is turning more and more **cartoon**... r u trying to make a cartoon MOAB? or is this just trying to make it pretty?
2. some of the champions r starting to look like **cartoon** charecters... again r u trying to make it a **cartoon** or acedent? ex. {{champion:18}} 
3. i like this game and i do not mind... just now it is looking like a **cartoon** more then a MOAB... te maps r looking like clay modals or else just fuzzy/big in some spots and all colourful... 
* (sorry to the people who disagrea but it is starting to look like a **cartoon** in season 5 more then season 4)

1. to make it back to a MOBA/online pvp u should put in darker colors or at least some scarier jg camps (spooky frog u got there) and when the time of the game goes on and on maybe change the color some more 

(make it night at like 10-25 mins?)

Remember this is a opinion not a think u have to do this 

(btw i think the {{item:3285}} does not have enough AOE please make it hit more tagets)

hard it dosent do all that much

I'm gonna be short and to the point: Love your work rito. It's good to see a developer putting in so much effort to constantly improve and change the look and feel of a platform.

you know how you have the ocean week and bring out new skins what if you did that but for eg...

its space week and instead of new skins you do and SR skin and make the map look like space and you fight alians and stuff instead of fighting baron and have planets that we destroy.
or... 

the map could be a desert or under the sea it could even be candy week or something. 

lol all im doing is casting out ideas and yeah i dont know where else to write them hahah.


one other idea was at the end of games make the pings fireworks for the victorious and throw balls of fire for the defeated.

anywaay have a good one enjoy your games
